headline.main: WORLD SHIP 'POOL' FOR U.S. FORECAST; Top Role for Washington in Control System Said to Be in the Making

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Nov. 1 (U.P.) -- Control of non-Axis world shipping will be centered in an international committee operating here if Congress repeals shipping restrictions in the Neutrality Act, informed diplomatic sources predicted today.
abstract: Ships: non-Axis shipping pool headed by U S Maritime Comm forecast
snippet: WASHINGTON, Nov. 1 (U.P.) -- Control of non-Axis world shipping will be centered in an international committee operating here if Congress repeals shipping restrictions in the Neutrality Act, informed diplomatic sources predicted today....
